Will you not take an interest in the erection of this 
                                                                           213
school building, in which the word of God is to be taught? . . . We expect to have a school building, in which the Bible can be taught, in which prayers can be offered to God, and in which the children can be instructed in Bible principles. We expect that every one who can take hold with us will want to have a share in erecting this building. We expect to train a little army of workers on this hillside. . . .
